pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reconstruct Individual-Level Data from Published KM Plots // Functions for reconstructing individual-level data (time, status, arm) from Kaplan-MEIER curves published in academic journals (e.g. NEJM, JCO, JAMA). The individual-level data can be used for re-analysis, meta-analysis, methodology development, etc. This package was used to generate the data for commentary such as Sun, Rich, Wei (2018) doi:10.1056/NEJMc1808567. Please see the vignette for a quickstart guide.
